select c.commodityName,d.commodityNo,sum(c.commodityNum) commodityNum, sum(c.totalPrice/100) totalPrice,c.unit FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN t_order b on a.userId = b.userId LEFT JOIN t_order_detail c on c.orderNumber = b.orderNumber RIGHT JOIN t_commodity d ON c.commodityId = d.commodityId where 1=1 AND b.orderStatus!=1 AND b.status=1
AND a.userId=#{relationMap.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( c.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or d.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
GROUP BY c.commodityName,d.commodityNo,c.unit
